overview:
Byron Smith is the founder of Smith and Wise Ireland, an up and coming digital media agency based in South Dublin, Smith and Wise has expanded from 10 clients to nearly 100 over the last two years.

Combining experience in new media marketing and business management, Byron has helped some of Ireland’s top SME’s to grow in recent years.

Byron is also a former winner of Young Social Innovator (Ireland) in the media category and an experienced Junior Web Developer, which has helped him to juggle client accounts with technical project planning to create innovative e-commerce and online marketing systems.
